entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Becoming clear overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 8:49 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023
